member.name: T:MouseWiggler.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:MouseWiggler.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:MouseWiggler.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:MouseWiggler.My.Resources.Resources.TrayIcon
member.summary: Looks up a localized resource of type System.Drawing.Icon similar to (Icon).

member.name: M:MouseWiggler.Power.EnableConstantDisplayAndPower(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Prevent screensaver, display dimming and power saving. This function wraps PInvokes on Win32 API.
member.param: True to get a constant display and power - False to clear the settings
